org.frans.thesis.PhotoApp
Interface CFAutoScalable

All Superinterfaces:
CFComponentModifiable
All Known Implementing Classes:
CFImage, CFMobileDeviceProxy, CFPhotoAlbum
public interface CFAutoScalable
extends CFComponentModifiable

This interface allows for interactive components to be automatically scaled. It extends CFComponentModifiable.

Method Summary
 boolean autoScaleIsOn()
          Checks if the autoscale functionality of a component is turned on.
 org.mt4j.util.math.Vector3D getPosition()
          Returns the position of an interactive component.
 void scaleComponentToLargeSize()
          Scales an interactive component to large size.
 void scaleComponentToStackSize()
          Scales an interactive component to small (stack) size.
 void turnAutoScaleOff()
          Turns the autoscale functionality of a component off.
 void turnAutoScaleOn()
          Turns the autoscale functionality of a component on.
 

Method Detail
